title: The Breed Next Door
description: An erotic thrill ride through the world of the Breeds from New York Times bestselling author Lora Leigh. New York Times bestselling author Lora Leigh takes the reader on an erotic thrill ride into the world of genetically altered Breeds-and the humans who stir their fiercest desires. An act of violence brings neighbors Lyra and Tarek together, igniting a burning passion that awakens Tarek to his true nature as a Lion Breed. However, Lyra isn't certain she can handle the mating heat.
author: Lora Leigh
